ygData.subject: RE: Odd doings in Halas
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah yes, I just completed this about 20 minits ago. There are actually three different vengeful skeletons that caused problems for some tonight. I had no
ygData.messageBody:
Ah yes, I just completed this about 20 minits ago. There are actually three
different vengeful skeletons that caused problems for some tonight. I had no
problems dealing with the artistically inclined undead at 25th.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Sean Kennedy [mailto:orang@...]
8)Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 7:20 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: [eqbards] Odd doings in Halas
8)
8)
8)From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>
8)
8)In Halas today I overheard a 15th level
8)shaman having a conversation with a
8)female human npc (Thadres something
8)or other) She mentioned that her brother
8)had mysteriously attacked a group of
8)bards, and been slain. Then spouted
8)something incoherent about the questioner
8)crossing her or some such, and proceeded
8)to make VERY short work of him/her.
8)
8)Then, out in Everfrost, there are 2 new kinds
8)of skeletons (red to the 3rd level shaman
8)I was goofing off with) called a Vengeful
8)Lyricist and a Vengeful Soloist.
8)
8)Methinks tis time to get my bard cross the
8)continent to check things out. I am only
8)1 level higher than the shaman who bought
8)it though, so it could be a dangerous thing.
8)
8)Tindayen
8)
8)
